replies.author: InCrafting
replies.txt_content:
thank you guys for commenting on my post. Unfortunately I can understand only a tiny bit that google can translate :)
If you have any concerns as to how durable these things are - the only thing I can say is that they ARE durable. But a key fob would unlikely last forever :) I am going to make a crash test and put it on YouTube next week and I will probably post it in a separate topic here, if the moderators allow.

replies.author: InCrafting
